docs.snippet: A firmer undertone prevailed in the foreign exchange market during the past week. With most of the world capitals having a short business week in observance of the Easter season dealings here were relatively light.
docs.lead_paragraph: A firmer undertone prevailed in the foreign exchange market during the past week. With most of the world capitals having a short business week in observance of the Easter season dealings here were relatively light.

headline.main: Foreign Exchange Rates; Week Ended March 31, 1961

docs.snippet: Foreign exchange market was quiet during the past week. British pound sterling showed some improvement while the Canadian dollar had a firm undertone for most of the sessions. Some European currencies eased.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchange market was quiet during the past week. British pound sterling showed some improvement while the Canadian dollar had a firm undertone for most of the sessions. Some European currencies eased.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 9 -- President Kennedy is expected to ask Congress this week for legislation to create a Cabinet department of urban affairs.

headline.main: KENNEDY STUDIES NEW CABINET POST; Expected to Ask for Urban Department This Week -- Congress May Balk KENNEDY STUDIES NEW CABINET POST

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., April 14 -- The United States told the Arab states today that they, not Washington policy, had injected political discord into a General Assembly debate on Palestine Arab refugees.

docs.abstract: Plimpton charges Arab states stir pol discord

headline.main: U.S. HOLDS ARABS STIR U.N. DISCORD; Says They and Not the Policy of Washington Envenom Debate on Refugees

byline.original: By KATHLEEN TELTSCH Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: HALLANDALE, Fla., April 15 (AP) -- Jo-Pat Stable's Battle Neck took the lead soon after the Start today and finished five and one-half lenghs in front in the $25,000 Southern Cross Handicap at Gulfstream Park.
docs.lead_paragraph: HALLANDALE, Fla., April 15 (AP) -- Jo-Pat Stable's Battle Neck took the lead soon after the Start today and finished five and one-half lenghs in front in the $25,000 Southern Cross Handicap at Gulfstream Park.

headline.main: Battle Neck, $28.40, Scores at Gulfstream After 5 Losing Starts This Year; BLUM HAS WINNER QUICKLY IN FRONT Bottle Neck Beats Favored Nickel Boy by 5 1/2 Lengths in $25,000 Handicap

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 15 -- A meeting next week of the Presidents of Argentina and Brazil will result in a stronger front against communism, according to Argentina's Foreign Minister.

docs.abstract: Min Taboada (Argentina) sees new unity against Communist infiltration from coming Frondizi-Quadros talks
